website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few drawbacks, the combination of a stunning high-resolution screen, long battery life, and impressive design make the Sony DVP-FX820 a winning portable DVD player.
pros: includes remote control, audiovisual cable and car charger
cons: no USB port or flash card reader
no support for DivX or other digital video files

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product description
customer_reviews.text: I have not contacted the seller, as I am accepting the DVD player the way it is. The picture quality is fine. The product came packed in original unsealed box. No mention was made in the product description that the sound was bad. I have used this model of DVD player for over 10 years, so I know how it's supposed to sound. With headphones on, the sound is fine. But without headphones the sound is "tinny" and an unpleasant experience. I wish the product description had said something about poor sound without headphones
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Cupido

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT little machine!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this Sony DVD player for 6 1/2 years, and it has been nothing short of spectacular!! It goes on vacation and road trips with us all the time. But I also use it everyday at home. I don't have a TV in my bedroom, so I use this to watch/listen to movies every morning while I'm getting ready for work. After countless hours of play, this little gem is still working perfectly. I did drop the remote a few too many times, and had to replace it, but that was my fault. I would definitely purchase this Sony DVD player again, and again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schmader

customer_reviews.title: Great DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this playerfor my wife so she could watch movies or music videos while jogging on her treadmill. After buying and returning other players, I found this to be the only one with sufficient volume to hear the dialog with earphones above the din of the treadmill. The controls - either remote or manual - are easy to use and the picture resolution is great. Also, the video will resume where you stopped it, even if you turn it off - something the other players won't do. Although this is not the cheapest player out there, if you're looking for a decent portable DVD Player that's easy to use, I highly recommend you look no further.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY

customer_reviews.title: Sony DVP-FX820 Portable DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: The Sony DVP-FX820 is a solidly built product. The twist screen works out well for my indoor biking arrangement. I flipped the screen 180 deg. The display has an honest 480 lines to avoid compromised picture of some other models using less than 480 lines of pixels. Machine is simple to operate. Only missing desired feature is zoom to generate larger picture when one doesn't mind losing some picture on left and right edges. Such a feature is standard on standard monitors, and may not be normal to have in dedicated small screens integrated with portable DVD player. This player is my personal favorite among many I tried at retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: W. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Inform and be Informed
customer_reviews.text: Highly portable and easy to operate, informational DVDs can be attractively presented to clients. Likewise, it can be used to gain information as well. And if time and circumstance permit, why not enjoy a rare movie as well? Amazon.com does have DVDs that are very hard to find - I just purchased the Academy Award Best Documentary of 1945. As to the product, it is a Sony. Quality at a bargain price makes for irresistible. My family has never been disappointed with Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Paulsel

customer_reviews.title: Good concept..
customer_reviews.text: I like the portable size. I am still learning about the adjustments. More review later on that. So far I find the screen is always very dark. Hopefully there is a secondary adjustment for this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice player
customer_reviews.text: First portable DVD player I have ever owned but it would be hard to beat. Very nice display, great sound. Battery life was 5 hours+ . I wish there was some illumination of the controls. Very difficult to see what's what on a dark train until you learn where everything is. Power button is also hard to find and easy to accidentally press. Individual volume controls for the headphones would be great so I suggest keeping all your headphones to the same model. I highly recommend a carrying case like the Targus.
customer_reviews.author: TrainLuvr

customer_reviews.title: small, gorgeous, has it all
customer_reviews.text: this small DVD player has friendly controls, good remote response, easy setup menu, large screen conversion from a 4:3 format movie and screen details and hue/nuance in a typical and lofty Sony quality Get a good harness for it and you can have it attached to the rear of your front seat. None of the goodies like a Philips, Toshiba player (I own the DV91S, and the PET1030) has been able to outmatch this Sony. For its price and its size, I would have giving it 4.5 stars rather than 5 stars. But for now it is a excellent choice
customer_reviews.author: Tuan A. Vu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: After researching DVD players for days and days, I finally found one with actually good reviews. Everything available at Target and Walmart had shaky reviews and many items not lasting long at all. This product let us start a movie in the car and when you turn off the car, you can still watch the movie from where it left off - this is something many people complained about in other players. I purchased the Phillips carrying case at Target and it worked in there perfectly. Love it! Kept my child occupied during the whole trip.
customer_reviews.author: M Riley

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Video Player
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased a Magnavox video player and found that the picture was not good enough to enjoy the movies. I read all the reviews on several different players and sent back the Magnavox. I have been so pleased with the Sony player. The picture is just wonderful. My eyes are not stained at all. I use earphones and the sound is very good. I find that I can watch at least 2 movies without recharging. I am very pleased with this and would definitely recommend it to anyone who is wanting a really good picture.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Great DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: We have had this DVD player for 2 months now - bought it for long car and plane trips. The swivel and flip is great, we have it mounted in the car and this makes it easy to turn toward the front seat so I can get the dvd going for the kids. The picture is great, the player does not stop when you stop the car like some do. We have not had any problems at all. I spent a month researching and this one seemed the most solid, so far so good! UPDATE: We've had this player for almost a year now, no problems!!
customer_reviews.author: Cosmosi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable player
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from a week long vacation with the portable player. Great picture. The sound isn't full range. No bass, but it is perfectly mid and highs for cars to cut through road noise. Sounds way better in the car than my laptop. The 6 hours battery is rated with brightness at lowest, which is almost not viewable. Expect closer to 4 hours. I like how both the standard electrical and car power adapter are included. I didn't do the car DVD holder. My kids like it on their lap then angle the screen way back
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fincey

customer_reviews.title: nice, but widescreen display problems
customer_reviews.text: I like this unit, nice sharp screen resolution as many have pointed out, decent sound although a bit tinny, lacking bass. Overall solid feel. My only problem is that when set to the default 16:9 widescreen, and strictly playing widescreen DVD's, some display properly (utilizing the full horizontal width) and some don't (displaying fat black bands at the left/right sides). For instance, the screen is 800x480 (a 1.66 ratio). When I play some widescreen DVD's with a 1.66 ratio they properly utilize the entire screen. And yet other widescreen DVD's with the same 1.66 ratio don't. Instead they play in a rectangle within the screen surrounded by thick black bands at top/bottom and left/right. Makes no sense.
customer_reviews.author: diskeed

customer_reviews.title: Its Good but...
customer_reviews.text: I really miss a mute button. The one I bought 2 years ago also didn't have a mute button. What's with that? I had a Mintek from 5 years ago with a mute button and its hard to beat. I gave the Mintek a bad review then later found out I wasn't following the instructions but I couldn't correct the review. This Sony also only turns if I'm on the left but not when I need it from the right. It's okay as these things go but if I had known there was no mute button I would have chosen something else.
customer_reviews.author: Im Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Great portable DVD player
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter and she has been using it about a month. So far it works great. I wanted to hook her Game Cube up to it but the cable ends were male for the DVD and the game console. I bought a three connector adapter at Radio Shack for $4 and it works like a charm. I am impressed as to the quality on the small screen as compared to a TV. I suppose because you sit closer to it the screen seems bigger. I have never used another brand but I am quite satisfied with the Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Privacy and comfort...
customer_reviews.text: I mainly got this because I needed something to be able to watch the movies that I like when the main t.v. and computer are both being used by others. I can put my earphones in, sit back at the table and watch my movies to my hearts desire, not disturbing anyone else or them disturbing me. I love the fact that I could get it in pink...keeps the menfolk away from MY little DVD player..lol I see nothing wrong with the picture or sound quality, it's all alright with me!
customer_reviews.author: Renekins

customer_reviews.title: The Best, Not Like New Junk!
customer_reviews.text: A "used" model, but this IS a competent portable DVD like my old one. The new Sylvania was a piece of junk. It looks as if all new models are built cheaply, for kids in the back seat, and I guess Sony can't sell good models at a higher price. What a shame. What will I do when this Sony gives out?
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous little player
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this product for very long, but I already love it. It has a gorgeous picture and I love that it plays both DVDs and CDs. The sound from the built-in speakers seems a tad "tinny"-sounding to me, but it wasn't particularly bothersome. With headphones, the sound is great. It is very easy to use. I also love having the remote control and look forward to taking it in the car or wherever. So far, I have been extremely pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: 6-Hour Battery Life is a deceiving feature
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews that the battery life is based on screen image - adjusting brightness and contrast but there should be some feature on this product to let you know at what levels you can set for 3 hour, 4 hour and up to 6 hour battery life. I took this on a 4-hour plane ride and it only lasted 2 1/2 hours. Quite a disappointment. Pivoting screen delights my daughter and the image is fine Overall, I'm good with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DS Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have been extremely pleased with this product. For such a small unit, the sound is clear and sufficiently loud to be heard easily amidst moderate levels of ambient noise (e.g. Chevy Suburban hum at 65 mph) The picture is excellent, the mechanical feel of the unit sound, and the swivel screen is very convenient. We've had no trouble reading old DVDs that my computer stutters over. Our last portable DVD player cost $90 less, but the extra money spent was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Finlayson

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Screen
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 2 other portable DVD players. The only problem was the screen resolution was a quarter of what a DVD actually shows so subtitles and details are fairly poor. Sony has stepped up on this with a fairly priced true SD resolution portable player. One oddity is the sparse audio options but has an optical connection. The speakers are good, but the best sound would come from headphones. This is perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sung

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted in a portable.
customer_reviews.text: This is just about the ideal size for a portable. I had looked at 10 inch versions but they tended to be a bit big. Other than Sony quality and a well laid out control arangement the real bonus with this model is the screen resolution. It is certainly the best picture on a portable that I have seen. Battery longevity seems to be accurate, just be aware that duration is given with the backlight turned way down.
customer_reviews.author: DSN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought used -like new, and it certainly a GREAT deal at $60. We love it! Fast ship and all accessories included. I esp like the fact that it can charge while using in the car, eliminating disappointment in the middle of a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Savanas mom

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We've had our DVD player for YEARS and it's held up soooo well. We still use it on trips (plug it up to our head rest monitors in the car) and anywhere we go where the kids have to wait any length of time. If I could rate it 10 stars I would. It's hard to find an electronic device that lasts this long. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna B. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Awsome picture
customer_reviews.text: You just have to love Sony products. This portable DVD player is probably the best one you will buy. It has the BEST picture I have seen on any protable DVD players and sounds great too! Controls are easy to use along with the remote. Sounds great in the car when using an ipod cord. Just wish it had a larger screen. But, once you see it in action you won't care what size the screen is. Would recomend this to anyone. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: E.A.A.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy DVD player, works well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this DVD player because I started a distance MBA program that sends you the courses on DVD, so I needed a way to watch them anywhere. The DVD player works great and it has lots of inputs/outputs, including 2 headphone jacks. The only disappointment was the battery life. It's advertised as 6 hours and probably comes in closer to 3 hours. Still, 3 hours is plenty of time to watch any DVD, so I would recommend this player.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: says what it does and does what it says...
customer_reviews.text: i bought this unit as a replacement to our previous one that met it's untimely demise on the deck of a pontoon boat last year. we weren't looking for anything especially fancy, but we were very pleased with the picture quality and ease of use. i'm no techie, but compared to the unit it replaced, i'd say this stands head and shoulders above the other unit that originally cost me twice as much...
customer_reviews.author: kenji s. aoki

customer_reviews.title: good dvd player
customer_reviews.text: The battery and sound were the selling point. Longer than most battery life with around 6 hours which is perfect for trips. You also get the jacks to hook to a tv which is good when your traveling to a hotel in another country because there aren't many English tv channels lol.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Maher Sylvania, Ohio

customer_reviews.title: The whole family just love it! It's a life saver if you have a Terrible Two.
customer_reviews.text: We have a terrible two, whose energy level is very high. This is the only thing can keep her quiet and laugh for over one hour. We use it every day. Beautiful pictures, very loud voice, but, not that good at the highest level. Controller is great! Very happy with this buying. Had thought to wait and buy the new model 850, but can't wait...Anyway, so happy! Excellent quality/price ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Good little dvd player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one in particular because it was the highest rated portable dvd player on consumer reports online. It's compact, got a clear picture, and easy to use. Only drawback is that the screen feels a little smaller than I would have liked but for the price it is really good. My kids use it in their room on "movie night" since we only have one TV in the house. We also use it in the car on long road trips. So far it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sissel

customer_reviews.title: Best Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this DVD player for my daughter for our long road trips. The higher definition picture quality is the best compared to the many portable DVD players out there. The sound quality is average not having much bass at all. The online menu is intuitive and easy to use. The 6 hour battery life is a plus for the long road trips plus it comes with a charger for use in the car. Overall you get alot of value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TTT

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I got this player a couple of months ago and it blew my last one away. The picture is wonderful, sound ok but I use phones, and I dropped the thing pretty good and it's very sturdy. Last week I was visiting my son who is out of work, his wife ill, and she had the worst little player to keep her entertained so I gave her mine. She is thrilled! Me, I'm buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Nodin

customer_reviews.title: Sony Portable DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Excellent image; Battery life enough to watch 2 movies (2 hours each); Different positions for screen; remote control easy to use. CONS: A little bit bulky; heavy; Sony does not offer an accessory to hold in the back of the car (at least I haven't found it) OVERALL: Excellent quality an easy to use for a fair price... I recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: Good player, solid sound and picture
customer_reviews.text: Have had for about 1 month, used for several long car trips. Great picture, very good sound. Plays very smoothly. Nice rotating screen, although still only 8". Well built. Charges quickly. Overall, very nice player. I had reviewed many evaluations and reviews prior to buying this unit, and it seems as though most thought that this was one of the best players in it's class. You do pay a little more for the Sony name, but I have always thought that was well payed money, as Sony usually makes very nice stuff.
customer_reviews.author: S. Capello

customer_reviews.title: Great when you need to kill some time
customer_reviews.text: I just love this player. you can watch a movie anywhere you want. Ether with head phones or not. it has speakers so if you have someone watching with you you won't need to have 2 sets head phones, but if you want privicy you can use headphones and you won't disturb anyone around you. But make sure you get a carring case to make it so much easyer to keep everything together when you travel.
customer_reviews.author: George A. Mulrooney

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: DVD movies do not size well on the wide screen. So now my daughter is watching movies with two black bands on each side. If good sizing options are not built in, what is the need for a wide screen? By the way, LG portable is lot easier to size in 3 or 4 formats, but the built quality sucks. My old one died about one year and 3 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: High resolution, brilliant images
customer_reviews.text: This product has a higher resolution LCD than most other cheapo models, and that translates to brilliant, crisp pictures. Well worth the extra money spent! Coupled with an excellent battery life, build quality, and style, and this player is definitely the one to beat. I love the video input/output feature as I use this as an auxiliary monitor for my Canon DSLR when it is mounted on a tripod and I can't look through the viewfinder. The only thing I wish this DVD player had is a Memory Stick Pro Duo slot so I can watch MP4s of shows exported from TiVo for my PSP. Hey Sony, are you listening?
customer_reviews.author: Jim Marte

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Having had good experiences with different Sony products, I decided to give this small DVD player a try. The picture is sharp, clear, and the tiny appliance is one of my best purchases ever for last year. It was a little bit more expensive than some of the off-brands, but I am so glad I paid a little more. It makes watching movies on a portable DVD enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R. Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a cross-country road trip with our 2-year-old daughter who loves Disney movies. It worked great but I feel that it should be a good product for the price. I originally wanted to buy a cheaper brand but opted for this one b/c of the longer battery life. The car adapter is nice too but won't help on flights. All in all, we're happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Louise

customer_reviews.title: good quality picture, small screen
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the picture is really nice but smaller then my previous dvd player, also i have problem with some movies, since its widescreen sometimes it doesnt play the movie on the entire screen but in a bix type view, so if you are playing a movie that doesnt have a widescreen version it will look even smaller on the dvd screen.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DVD PLAYER
customer_reviews.text: I love this dvd player. The clarity of the picture is wonderful, the swivel feature is terrific. I can find no fault with this player. The only feature I wish it had was a zoom -which my old Sanyo had. Other than that (and its no biggie) this is a super player and well worth the money. I've had it almost 6 months and its still doing a great job! You can't beat a Sony!
customer_reviews.author: DinoC

customer_reviews.title: It's a SONY-Expect Anything Less?
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. The reviews won me over. It's a SONY product and it works great. Battery life was important and the reviews are right. It lasts a long time between charging. Movies are pure and bright and controls plus remote are easy to use. Used it on a 737 and didn't need earphones to hear, unlke my DELL computer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Leo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice portable dvd player
customer_reviews.text: I think the other reviewers have done a great job reviewing the product. I just want to add the best case for this DVD player is the Case Logic PDVK-9. The 10-inch version is slightly bigger but the 9-inch fit perfectly. Probably too fit to plug in the power connector. For me, I was just looking for something as fit as possbile. With this case, you can have the player fully extended (open up 180 degrees) or folded with the LCD facing out (flip open), which are the features I looked for in a case.
customer_reviews.author: Anh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Decent unit, well made.
customer_reviews.text: It's a few years old now. Battery gives me about 4 hours or so of use. Still functions well.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Not a Gadget
customer_reviews.text: When we bought this portable dvd player, we thought it might be great for the kids to watch their movies whenever we go on long trips. We never gave it to them. It is so beautiful and has such good quality, that we are the ones who use it. It is easy to use and has great quality. Not flimsy at all. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cohen de Mishaan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for another portable dvd player with a longer battery life and I'm so glad I went with this sony one as the picture quality is outstanding. I didnt find any problem with the sound, it does not come with headphones or a carry case but as I already had acessories it was no big deal, and having a six hour battery can't be beat for the price,I have always loved sony products and have not been disappointed,my previous dvd player was a polaroid and it was okay but couldn't compare to sony!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Young

customer_reviews.title: Perfect companion for roadtrips
customer_reviews.text: We got this DVD player so our son could watch something while we drive - he hates being in the car. It's durable, despite several drops in the car, and very ease to use right out-of-the-box. The battery time is good and the speakers are pretty clear sounding when not used with a headset. For the price, you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lund

customer_reviews.title: Great Player, awesome screen picture, swivel a must for airplane
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading the reviews. The screen is really sharp, just as others have said. I didnt think I would need the swivel part, but when using on a plane it is a must. I took this to a trip that involved a 5 plus hour plane flight and watched hours of movies. The battery life held up and the swivel screen was very handy in the cramped seats because you can swing the player portion around to slide back while the screen can be tipped back and slid back.
customer_reviews.author: James779

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this portable DVD player for our three year old, and absolutely love it. Great quality all the way around. Not to mention the DVD player has been though a lot with a three year old and has the same great quality as the day we bought it. We have owned it for almost 2 years now. Great product
customer_reviews.author: J. Hochkins

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I'd reviewed portable dvd players quite a bit before I ended up purchasing this one. I don't know if I just ended up with a defective one, but it freezes halfway through the movie. This happened on the 2nd movie watched on this. I have heard portable dvd players are a hit or miss, and this one was a miss.
customer_reviews.author: Alyholic

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is excellent. Can twist the screen around like a tablet PC to hold. This covers the open button for the DVD. You can also lock the buttons so that small children can touch the buttons without any effect. Great for traveling anywhere, in any mode of transportation. (especially for flying where there is no electrical outlet) Comes with a car charger and an AC adapter but the battery should suffice for 4 - 6 hours. Sound is good with or without earphones. Picture is good too. A little more expensive than the rest, but well worth it. Very nicely designed.
customer_reviews.author: Whata Wheasel

customer_reviews.title: Great DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on a long plane trip and I was very pleased. The long life battery was great. This DVD player will be great on any long trip where a plug-in isn't available. Recommend this DVD player any time. Price was great also. Bought it from VANN's.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Bought as xmas gift for my daughter and was very please.Had it almost a year and it stopped working.Emailed sony and they replaced it with no problem and it has worked fine since.It has very clear picture and good quality sound.Lots of features good battery life as we take it on airplane trips from Tx to Boston with no problems. My now 6 year old still loves it and we have had it for about 3 years.I would recommend this player or the newer version.
customer_reviews.author: zigg

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: interesting that some CDs will work and others won't. Haven't figured that out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Seller!!
customer_reviews.text: I left a previous negative review due to a missing part, but seller went above and beyond to resolve the problem and I feel terrible that I didn't correct this review sooner. Would definitely buy from this seller again without hesitation. Excellent communication!
customer_reviews.author: C. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great DVD, but a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality and I really like the fact that the battery is flat and fits on the bottom of the unit. The only drawback is that it is a little heavy. If you go to cnet.com, you'll find a review of this DVD player, and they mention the weight as a drawback as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wigjiggy

customer_reviews.title: Great DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: This DVD Player has excellent picture quality and is easy to use. It's also very light. The battery is supposed to last 6 hours but we haven't tested how long the batteries will last yet. It's best for playing widescreen DVD's because full screen DVD's are smaller in this player. I suppose it's because it's made for wide screen DVD's. Quality is really great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mench

customer_reviews.title: Sony designs great product ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked at several different DVD Players on line and at the store. My criteria were battery life, picture quality and kid proof. 6 hrs of battery life, a great picture and the ability to spin the screen 180 to keep kids hands off the disc itself (if it's sitting on an airplane tray table) is a great feature. Unfortunately the first one I bought had a problem within the first week with the carrier for the laser (stopped tracking) but Amazon replaced it immediately. Replacement is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Erik O

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value, Excellent Performance
customer_reviews.text: Researched all the comp's for this item. Sony's new edition performs very well with a great picture and decent sound quality. The battery performance is just great. Best price found on Amazon. Can't miss with this product. Congrat's to Sony.
customer_reviews.author: bigrin

customer_reviews.title: Great player!
customer_reviews.text: This player is exactly what we were looking for. It has a good quality picture and is very simple to use. We also use it as a DVD player for our room so we get dual purpose out of it! My daughter loves being able to watch movies in the car on long trips. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: kellypip

customer_reviews.title: Good quality in small package
customer_reviews.text: I haven't taken this on a trip yet, but I really like what I see. The picture and sound quality is very good. I'll be using it for my workout DVDs, so I plan to use it often. I also got a travel case and headphones to go with the player - a nice convenient package.
customer_reviews.author: A. Simons

customer_reviews.title: sony portable DVD play DVP-FX820excellent!! picture, etc and i can hear it!!
customer_reviews.text: i bought a audiovox DVD73 player the first time and couldn't hear it without earphones on, and the picture was dark i bought the DVP-FX820 and am thrilled!! the picture is outstanding and the sound is plenty loud spend the extra money here and get the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan E. Painter

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit. However, I would like to see the screen move in both direccions and I would like to have more options to change the picture size on the screen, even if the movie does not allow it. At 8 inches, with a picture size like a TV, it's hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel P.

customer_reviews.title: Go For It ! One of my best purchases on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. Works great, easy to use, light to carry around, battery lasts very long, comes with all cables. Easy to connect to TV set, great as a stand-alone unit. Now wife and I can take kid out to restaurants and eat in peace. Or fly in peace. Or wait at airports in peace. This is one of the best products I ever bought. Ever. Way to go Sony !
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Motta

customer_reviews.title: Sony DVP-FX820
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are extremely pleased with this purchase. She uses it for her exercise DVD's and I practice with a guitar DVD. It is compact, easy to use, and very well made. We've owned it for almost three months and have only good to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful surprise for my gandkids for Christmas. Gave them a pink one & a blue one to keep them separated. They loved them. I think the Sony DVP-FX820/P 8: portable DVD player it a good quilty product that will give the kids lots of enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Compact design and exceptional screen quality. The clamshell design flips flat like a tablet PC and the DVD controls are conveniently located even when flat. Durability so far is good. Battery life is better than other units I have owned, but not six hours.
customer_reviews.author: KurT

customer_reviews.title: SONY DVP-FX820
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these as christmas presents for my sons. Both work great and I have had no issues with them. The battery life is the best part. They say the battery will last 6 hours. Common sense tells me it will be a little short but I know the boys have each watched 2 movies in a row with no shortage of battery. There is plenty of volume and the headphone jacks are great when used in a vehicle. I can't think of one complaint or problem we've encountered so far.
customer_reviews.author: 51 CJ3A

customer_reviews.title: Saves My Sanity During Road Trips!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dvd player used for $54.99, I think it retails new for about $300 so yay for me! I love it, we've had it for a couple weeks and haven't had any issues with it yet. Picture and sound are good, easy to use controls, the car charger I bought for it on ebay works just fine. Happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE -- COMMON ISSUE:: SCREEN STOPS WORKING!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in April 2009. In December 2009, the screen went black. There was still sound, but no picture, and none of the buttons worked. Reading the the comments, I see this is a common complaint! 90 days parts warranty does me no good. So I will send it back to Sony, and have it fixed (labor warranty is one year). THIS IS NOT AN ISOLATED INCIDENT!!! READ ALL OF THE COMMENTS!!
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on family trip
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a 4 hour car trip with our 18 month old. The sound was wonderful and the battery life was lasted through the trip. So far we are very happy with this purchase. The red color is also a fabulous, vibrant shade of red.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best portable dvd i bought
customer_reviews.text: My first dvd player i bought was a toshiba mode SD-P91S i thought it was ok good battery life good 9 inch screen. But the sony with its 8 inch screen is alot brighter and clearer, also the battery life is about the same. the sony also performs better it dosnt feel cheap, and plays amlost any disc without any problems. the toshiba is very picky on the disc you play, and like to skip alot and make lots of noise. buy this sony its one of the few good sony products
customer_reviews.author: Shane R. Crombie

customer_reviews.title: Sony DVD Portable DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, no problems hooking the battery to the player. I use my husband's headphones, which came with his portable CD player. Sound quality is good too. Love the picture quality. I would recommend this to a friend if they want one.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri L. Dacosta

customer_reviews.title: "Disposable" should be in the description.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this DVD Player back in March 2009. It really worked great on keeping my son occupied during daily commutes/long rides (bought the car mount with it). Every once in a while we would only get sound and no picture but if you turned it on and off a couple times the picture would appear...Now we're in November and there is no picture at all. To spend $150 on a disposable product seems a bit expensive. Next time I'm going with cheap no-name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take with us on vacation and although we are really only using it as a dvd player and using a separate monitor for viewing, it has worked great. When using it for viewing, it looks great and the audio is great too for a portable player.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Best DVD Player Ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dvd player, the battery life alone makes it worth every penny I paid for it. The picture and sound quality are phenomonal, I look forward to be able to take this on long trips. My old portable dvd player only had a 2hr battery life to it, maybe 2 1/2. I love the lcd screen, it makes it so there is no glare whatsoever and the swivel screen is also great. D.Coughlin N.H.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent CD player! Child lock prevents little wondering hands! My daughter loves it! She will watch it while in the airport. Priceless investment. Best DVD player with great features - Sony never dissppoints!
customer_reviews.author: L. Nickles

customer_reviews.title: The Sony DVP-Fx820
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for about a month or so. Because my eyes aren't so good, I had to get something that I could watch and enjoy and see. the picture on it is very clear, the sound is very good and so far i am enjoying this product. The size of the screen is perfect and the really great part of this is that I can carry it in my backpack. I would recommend this product. And also, the price was good. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia Miranda

customer_reviews.title: 7 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Sony FX820 for our daughter at Christmas. The screen has stopped working only 7 months later. You can hear movies but you can not see the picture. Of course it is out of warranty. Sony's website offers to refurbish it for $136 (you can buy a new one for $153) what a joke. That does not include fixing the display on it which is the part that is broke. This is the second Sony item that we are not happy with. Used to love Sony, not anymore. Will have to look for a new more reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Ann

customer_reviews.title: Just what my daughter wanted
customer_reviews.text: The personal DVD player was just what my daughter wanted. She is thrilled with the functions and loves the fact that the screen can swivel around and be laid flat to view. She loves it. And pink is her favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Craig H. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Screen died after 17 months
customer_reviews.text: Play a few times a week and screen and all buttons died on me today. That's the end of this machine. Not such good value. Don't think I should have to replace item after a year and a half. Annoyed and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: L chandler

customer_reviews.title: Sony FX820 DVD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for my sister's birthday. She has not had it very long, but is so pleased with it. It is easy to set up, light to carry and gives a great picture. A wonderful gift to give or own for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Kate'sPlace

customer_reviews.title: It is a Sony-excellent
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but solid item. Had 2 off brands-both 86'd. Bought for wife-but used on a job on the Mexican border--dusty,cold,hot and bounced around alot--still ticking-tho red finish some worse for abuse. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: G. E. brown

customer_reviews.title: The first unit was defective, but Amazon's no-hassle replacement saved the day.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box the first unit was defective - it constantly skipped and made unnatural noises while attepting to play DVDs. Enter Amazon's no-hassle replacement - which saved the day. The replacement process that Amazon has is simple, easy and seamless. I'll review the replacement DVD player unit seperately.
customer_reviews.author: D. Polson

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst purchase I've done on amazon. dvd only works half the dvd, then freezes. the sound is awesome and the video quality too. But what good is if I can not see the full dvd? If you need a second monitor with good sound, you can serve. It's a shame that Sony has such bad products.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this DVD player. The sharpness of the screen is way better than even my TV at home. The screen does not have an angle that is hard to view at either. It is well built and the screen turns completly around to allow the player to be collapsed flat (great for in the car). We've used it on many long car rides. Also the controls are easily accessable.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Portable!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture for a portable player. Battery life could be longer but it will easily get through 2 hours of video. I would recommend this unit to my friends should they be looking for a solidly built Sony product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great Size!
customer_reviews.text: Any bigger and this would be more like a laptop than a travel DVD player. We have used it several times and while the sound quality could be a little bit better, overall it is a great little travel media item.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with a Sony
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable DVD player to replace another I had recently purchased which was of poor quality. The Sony has a crisp picture, good sound quality and volume, well-thought-out design and controls, and quality construction. The inferior player I replaced had none of these attributes. My advice, don't waste your money on anything less.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Player for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a recent flight - worked very well. Prior to the trip - I charged up the battery but it only showed 2/3 full. None the less, I used it during the trip, then recharged and now it is showing Full.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Sony DVP-FX820 8inch portable DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Have researched the web for some time to find the right unit to use while on the treadmill, as of this writing I have not been disappointed the image is sharp, the audio on the headset more than adequate, the battery is a miracle in design, and the service from Amazon as usual was exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Esper Esau

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Rated highly this portable DVD player has everything you could want. The picture is excellent, the sound is reasonable, the product is sturdy, compact and not too heavy. At $130 this is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: M Gutwein

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use DVD player, great picture
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased that this DVD player was very easy to use, haven't totally tested the battery but it made it through a whole movie and was not fully charged at the time. The picture is very clear, fun to watch.
customer_reviews.author: ZEFR

customer_reviews.title: Simon's DVD player
customer_reviews.text: As a Sony product, the portable DVD player was all that I expected. The 11 year old who received this gift was exceptionally pleased with it. The resolution is high and the battery life is long.
customer_reviews.author: Allan G. Peck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: The Sony DVP-FX820 is a truely great product! The Battery Life is exceptional as well as both the picture and sound quality. Get this item on sale since the Sony DVP-FX930 came out. It is essentially the same product but with a 9" screen.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Edgerly

customer_reviews.title: Sony DVP-FX820
customer_reviews.text: Works great right out of the box. Plays DVD-/+R disks without a problem. Large beautiful display although fits very tight in the recommended travel case, not allowing the screen panel to open completely. Battery life and remote are very good. Great quality as expected from a Sony product. You defiantly get what you pay for in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer22

customer_reviews.title: enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the DVD payer a short time, but to date it's great. Bought it for my bathroom so I could enjoy movies as I take a long bath. No problems. And I like that I could take it in the road it I wanted to... haven't yet but I can see doing it. I look forward to using it for the long term.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It has gotten used for various road trips especially if the girls don't want the bulk of a laptop or if someone wants to watch a different movie. We have had it for a while with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This DVD Player has a very nice size screen with good color contrast. The battery life is very good, lasting about 5-6 hours. I've always liked Sony for these types of electronics, and from what I've seen this is is one of the best options in this price bracket. It's also fairly light to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Roe

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!
customer_reviews.text: This is great product. The picture is really good and the sound is great! I kept on half contrast like was suggested. The batterie lasted 6 hours. I would recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gates

product_meta.title: Sony DVP-FX820/P 8-Inch Portable DVD Player, Pink
product_meta.description: Color:PinkWatch movies anytime and anywhere you want with Sony's cool and colorful DVP-FX820 Portable DVD Players. With a 6hr battery life, an 8" high-resolution swivel screen that provides a clear and crisp picture from any angle, 2 headphone jacks for sharing, and a car adapter that ensures your movies outlast even the longest road trip. And when you want more than movies, the FX820 plays your CDs or MP3s, and lets you view your personal photo albums. You can choose your preferred color among Black, Cherry Red, Cool Blue, Bubble Gum Pink and Snow White. Then, sit back and enjoy the crispy and sharp image with this Sony high-resolution LCD display.
feature_bullets: Up to 6 Hour of Battery Life
